name: BRICKS (BodhiSlam)
description:
Bricks is a game about using non-violence & kindness to save your fellow humans from the enslavement of propaganda in the Modern World.

Use left or right click to move your Student near other brainwashed students to encourage them to speak out against their oppressors! Your good-vibes transmissions alleviates their suffering and helps them radiate with good emotions as well!


Art, Programming, Design - Bryan Cohen - https://hexgridlife.itch.io/

Audio, Design - Stephanie Engelbrecht - https://beepboops.itch.io/

Aesthetic inspired by Pink Floyd's The Wall (1982).

Developed in 2 days for the 2018 Global Game Jam
